articles.title: Breakthrough COVID-19 infections spur strong antibody responses: Study - Mint
articles.description: The researchers observed that the increased number of exposures to SARS-CoV-2 antigens, either through infection and vaccination or triple vaccination, enhanced the quality of antibody responses
